articles.title: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. Cancels $500 Million in mRNA Vaccine Funding
articles.description: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. announced the withdrawal of $500 million in funding for mRNA vaccines targeting diseases such as the flu and COVID-19, citing concerns that 'mRNA technology poses more risks than benefits for these respiratory viruses.'

articles.title: Texas Redistricting Fight Escalates into National Political Battle
articles.description: Republicans in Texas are attempting to create more safe U.S. House seats, prompting Democrats to counteract by redrawing district maps in blue states. Texas Governor Greg Abbott has filed a lawsuit to remove the state's House Democratic leader.

articles.title: House Republicans Subpoena Jeffrey Epstein Files
articles.description: House Republicans have issued a subpoena for files related to Jeffrey Epstein, demanding transparency over the late sex offender's case, despite recent moves by President Trump to mitigate public outrage.
